snippet: Fresh numbers show that the United States and India have been the best performers in new orders over the last three months.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off The Charts column elaborates on global manufacturing trends that show the United States and India having the fastest-growing rates of new orders over the past three months.
lead_paragraph: Fresh numbers show that the United States and India have been the best performers in new orders over the last three months.

headline.print_headline: What’s Up? New Orders in the U.S., but Not in Most of Europe
headline.seo: Business Is Rising in U.S., but Not in Most of Europe
headline.main: What’s Up? New Orders in the U.S., but Not in Most of Europe
